About Me

Hi, I am a second year graduate student at The University of Texas at Austin. I major in Mathematics, and my research interest include analysis, partial differential equations, dynamic systems, fluid equations and so on. I received my bachelor degree at Xi’an Jiaotong University, where I was also a student of Special Class for the Gifted Young before my undergraduate study.

Apart from mathematics, I also love programming and music.

It is my honor to be coadvised by Prof. Caffarelli and Prof. Vasseur.
